job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description:
Kubernetes, Helm Charts, DevOps
AWS
Hands on experience in Kubernetes
Hands on experience in Helm charts
Deep experience in setting up/maintain CI/CD pipelines and the processes(GitLab/Jenkins/Bamboo).
Experience with modern observability/monitoring systems such as Splunk, Grafana, Prometheus
Experience with Infrastructure as Code tools and best practices such as Terraform or CloudFormation, as well as knowledge of configuration management systems (Puppet/Chef/Ansible/Salt).
